desc: Purchasing a home with Roux & Hunter is a really easy journey. Our main business ethos is customer service and we want to give you a five star and friendly service. You may have noticed, we are offering an introductory fee of 1% until January 2021. Please be aware this is a sole agency agreement for 12 months.

layout.text: Panoramic sea views and private pool views from main living areas and master bed
